parameter.name: nLeft
parameter.description: X coordinate of work area upper left corner.

parameter.name: nTop
parameter.description: Y coordinate of work area upper left corner.

parameter.name: nRight
parameter.description: X coordinate of work area lower right corner.

parameter.name: nBottom
parameter.description: Y coordinate of work area lower right corner.

remarks.p: The work area is the area of the desktop that is not covered by maximized windows.
Invoking this function does not automatically reposition maximized windows.
